channel.title: Git 2.26 progress on SHA-256
channel.description:
At a pace slower than a bacterium on a snail's ass, Git is adding SHA-256 hashing for objects. Let's hope this work is done before the apocalypse.
https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=news_item&px=Git-2.26-Released
